text: Veronica Escobar (born September 15, 1969) is an American politician. She is the U.S. Representative for since 2019. She is a member of the Democratic Party. She was an El Paso County Commissioner from 2007 to 2011 and the El Paso County Judge from 2011 until 2017. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Texas Category:Politicians from El Paso, Texas Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Veronica Escobar
